page.title: 14Playground games in Barton
page.content:
One of the games we play at St Mary's is called "Runaround". In this game all the players line up against the wall. At a signal everyone runs to the grass and back. The last one to return is "on".
The one who is "on" then calls out someones name. He/she has to run to the grass avoiding the one who is "on". If caught he/she is also "on". If the one chosen succeeds in reaching the grass there is a "full charge" in which all run to the grass and back. Any captured join the one who is "on".
Other playground games include football, cricket and tennis at various seasons. Dolls and toys brought from home are also played with.
